TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsDocument extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义用于生成强类型的运行时语法的设计时对象，符合[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/)。

span.span: Defines a design-time object that is used to build strongly-typed runtime grammars that conform to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以构造一个空实例，并通过将添加用于表示 SRGS 元素，如类的实例中生成语法， ，， ， ，和。You can you construct an empty instance and build a grammar by adding instances of classes that represent SRGS elements, such as , ,, , , and . 此外可以构造实例从现有的 SRGS 符合 XML 语法文件，从实例，或从实例。You can also construct an instance from an existing SRGS-compliant XML grammar file, from an instance of , or from an instance of . 后创建对象，它可以加载到对象或编译的，使其可以通过读取对象。After the object is created, it can be loaded into a object or compiled by , enabling it to be read by a object. 请参阅[创建语法使用 SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906)中[系统语音.NET Framework 4.0 编程指南](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043)有关详细信息和示例。See [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information and examples.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的构造函数类，你可以创建的实例从， ，或对象，包含 XML 格式的语法，路径的字符串，或者你可以启动一个空白实例。Using the constructors for the class, you can create an instance of from a , , or object, from a string that contains the path to an XML-format grammar, or you can initiate a blank instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 接受所有有效的语言-国家/地区代码。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes. 若要执行使用中指定的语言的语音识别属性、 语音识别引擎支持，必须安装语言-国家/地区代码。To perform speech recognition using the language specified in the property, a speech recognition engine that supports that language-country code must be installed. 随 Microsoft Windows 7 的语音识别引擎使用以下语言-国家/地区代码。The speech recognition engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes. - en GB。en-GB. 英语 （英国）English (United Kingdom) - EN-US。en-US. 英语 （美国）English (United States) - -d。de-DE. 德语 （德国）German (Germany) - es-ES.es-ES. 西班牙语 （西班牙）Spanish (Spain) - fr 法属fr-FR. 法语 （法国）French (France) - 日本 JP。ja-JP. 日语 （日本）Japanese (Japan) - 中文-CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中国）Chinese (China) - 中文-TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 两个字母的语言代码，例如"en"，"fr"或者"es"还允许使用。Two-letter language codes such as "en", "fr", or "es" are also permitted.

span.span: The value being assigned to is .
The value being assigned to is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Speech::Recognition::SrgsGrammar::SrgsGrammarMode Mode { System::Speech::Recognition::SrgsGrammar::SrgsGrammarMode get(); void set(System::Speech::Recognition::SrgsGrammar::SrgsGrammarMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 类的模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the mode for the class.
The recognition mode of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的成员，它确定的输入类型，要求。The property returns a member of the that determines the type of input that the expects. 两个可能的值为`Voice`语音输入和`Dtmf`通常会用的电话相关联的双音多频率 (DTMF) 铃音输入。The two possible values are `Voice` for speech input, and `Dtmf` for input of dual-tone multi-frequency (DTMF) tones that are commonly associated with a telephone.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Speech::Recognition::SrgsGrammar::SrgsPhoneticAlphabet PhoneticAlphabet { System::Speech::Recognition::SrgsGrammar::SrgsPhoneticAlphabet get(); void set(System::Speech::Recognition::SrgsGrammar::SrgsPhoneticAlphabet value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 类的注音字母表。

span.span: Gets or sets the phonetic alphabet of the class.

value.span: 返回必须用于在 对象中指定自定义发音的语音字母表。

span.span: Returns the phonetic alphabet that must be used to specify custom pronunciations in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拼音字母表组成手机，包含字母、 数字或字符，有时在组合中。Phonetic alphabets are composed of phones, which consist of letters, numbers or characters, sometimes in combination. 每个 phone 描述唯一声音的语音。Each phone describes a unique sound of speech. 这是相反的拉丁字母表中，为其任何字母可能表示多个所说的声音。This is in contrast to the Latin alphabet, for which any letter may represent multiple spoken sounds. 在单词"thing"和"那些"考虑字母"c"中的单词"糖果"和"停止"，不同发音或字母组合不同发音"th"。Consider the different pronunciations of the letter "c" in the words "candy" and "cease", or the different pronunciations of the letter combination "th" in the words "thing" and "those". 在 System.Speech，你可以使用三个拼音字母表的任何指定自定义发音： 国际电话字母表 (IPA)、 通用电话设置 (UPS) 或 SAPI phone 集。In System.Speech, you can use any of three phonetic alphabets to specify custom pronunciations: International Phone Alphabet (IPA), Universal Phone Set (UPS), or the SAPI phone set. 指定的拼音字母确定设置哪些电话将用于定义的内联发音对象。The specified phonetic alphabet determines which phone set will be used to define inline pronunciations for objects. 中指定手机必须匹配拼音字母表中指定。The phones specified in must match the phonetic alphabet specified in . 请参阅[词典和拼音字母表](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51)有关详细信息。See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ XmlBase { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 的基 URL 类。

span.span: Gets or sets the base URI of the class.
The current base URI of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取一个值，用于解析相对 Uri 中的对象。 property gets a value that is used to resolve relative URIs in a object. 假设的值是"http://www.contoso.com/"和包含相对规则引用另一个文档，例如`SrgsRuleRef("ExternalGrammar.grxml")`。Suppose the value for is "http://www.contoso.com/" and the contains a relative rule reference to another document, for example `SrgsRuleRef("ExternalGrammar.grxml")`. 这将创建外部文档的以下绝对路径： `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml`。This creates the following absolute path to the external document: `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml`.
